Title: The Message
Writer: H.A.L. Craig, Tewfik El-Hakim, A.B. Jawdat El-Sahhar, A.B. Rahman El-Sharkawi, Mohammad Ali Maher
Actors: Anthony Quinn, Irene Papas, Michael Ansara, Johnny Sekka
Plot: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.
Country: Lebanon, Libya, Kuwait, Morocco, UK, Saudi Arabia, Egypt
